basic.description:
Continuation of MUSC 183/3.0. A more advanced study of the complete brass family of instruments. Emphasis includes playing techniques, ranges, fingerings, transpositions, instrument maintenance, method books, ensemble repertoire and teaching techniques. Rental instruments available.
NOTE    Enrolment is limited to students in a MUSC Plan or the B.Mus. Program.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Brass Techniques and Methods II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    MUSC183 or permission of the instructor.
